title: GoDaddy, Alibaba, Travel Stocks - Reuters
description: The S&P 500 was on track for a record closing high on Monday, as a strong retail sales report underscored the strength of the U.S. economy and overshadowed worries from Omicron-driven flight cancellations that hit stocks in the travel sector.

title: Adobe, Alibaba, Casting Health, Wayfair, Salesforce - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes were mixed on Wednesday ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve's December meeting, as investors swapped technology stocks for cyclicals that stand to benefit from a high interest rate environment.

title: Stocks break four-day winning streak as Tencent, Alibaba slip - Reuters
description: Emerging market stocks broke a four-day winning streak on Wednesday as regulatory fines hit heavyweights Tencent and Alibaba, dragging tech stocks, while worries about inflation and tighter U.S. monetary policy also weighed.

title: U.S.-listed China stocks pick up momentum after a bruising 2021 - Reuters
description: U.S.-listed China shares rose before the opening bell on Friday, enjoying a robust rally at the start of the year as fewer jarring regulatory headlines from Beijing spurred investors to pick up battered names including Alibaba, JD.com and Baidu.

title: EXCLUSIVE U.S. examining Alibaba's cloud unit for national security risks - sources - Reuters
description: The Biden administration is reviewing e-commerce giant Alibaba's cloud business to determine whether it poses a risk to U.S. national security, according to three people briefed on the matter, as the government ramps up scrutiny of Chinese technology companie…

title: XIAN BATTLES COVID-19 IN WORST OUTBREAK TO HIT A CHINESE CITY THIS YEAR
description: The Xian Industrial and Technology Center in China reported  more than 100 new COVID-19 cases on Thursday, making the number of locally transmitted infections  the highest in any Chinese city this year. Xian reported 155 new local cases on December 29th. Dece…

title: Wells Fargo, Salesforce, Sony - Reuters
description: U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Wednesday ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve's December meeting, even as big technology stocks continued to fall, with Salesforce.com declining after a brokerage downgrade

title: Tech weakness drag Hong Kong shares lower - Reuters
description: Hong Kong's Hang Seng index closed lower on Wednesday, as tech shares mirrored global weakness, while China's top market regulator announcing new fines on leading technology companies also weighed on sentiment.

title: Salesforce, Mainz Biomed - Reuters
description: U.S. stock indexes were set for a lower open on Wednesday ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve's December meeting, as big technology stocks extended their fall.

title: Rivian, JD.com, Plus Therapeutics, Bed Bath & Beyond - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes fell in choppy trading on Thursday after minutes from the Federal Reserve's last meeting struck a hawkish note, pushing down shares of big technology companies and buoying economy-sensitive cyclical sectors.

title: EXCLUSIVE TikTok owner ByteDance's revenue growth slowed to 70% in 2021 - sources - Reuters
description: ByteDance, the owner of short video app TikTok, saw its total revenue grow by 70% year-on-year to around $58 billion in 2021, according to two people familiar with the matter, slower growth than a year earlier as China tightens its grip on big tech companies.

title: IShares ESG fund suffered 91% drop in assets under management this week - Reuters

title: Ant Group is connected to former Hangzhou party secretary's corruption case - FT - Reuters
description: Ant Group is connected to a corruption scandal involving the former party secretary of Chinese technology hub Hangzhou, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing public records and sources.

title: China says will probe corrupt behaviour behind internet platform monopolies - Reuters
description: China's top anti-graft watchdog said it would focus on "new challenges and new situations" in its corruption crackdown, pledging for instance to investigate and punish any corrupt behaviour found behind internet platform monopolies.
